This also loads and/or plots tasks

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
workingdir='C:/Users/apike/OneDrive - University College London/metaRL'

library('ggplot2')
library('patchwork')
```

Key settings

```{r}
newtask=1 #turns off creation of new tasks

scriptdir='C:/Users/apike/OneDrive - University College London/metaRL/scripts/'
taskdir='C:/Users/apike/OneDrive - University College London/metaRL/tasks/'

ntrials=1000
```



Now to create various tasks

```{r}
source(paste0(scriptdir,'create_reversal_task.R')) #creates task if necessary
source(paste0(scriptdir,'create_reversal_task_irregular.R')) #creates task if necessary
source(paste0(scriptdir,'create_randomwalk_task.R')) #creates task with random walk if necessary
source(paste0(scriptdir,'generate_random_walk.R'))
source(paste0(scriptdir,'create_gng_task.R')) #creates task if necessary
source(paste0(scriptdir,'plot_task.R')) #creates task plot
source(paste0(scriptdir,'plot_gng_task.R')) #creates task plot
source(paste0(scriptdir,'loadRData.R')) #loads and names RData files

if (newtask==1){
  task1b<-create_randomwalk_task(0,0.05,ntrials,0.7,0.3,0.9,0.1,coupled=TRUE,taskname='task1b',taskdir)
  task2b<-create_randomwalk_task(0,0.05,ntrials,0.7,0.3,0.9,0.1,coupled=FALSE,taskname='task2b',taskdir)
  task3b<-create_reversal_task (ntrials, nreversals = 50, probability = 0.8, coupled=TRUE,taskname='task3b',taskdir)
  task4b<-create_reversal_task_irregular (ntrials, nreversals = 50, probability = 0.8, coupled=FALSE,taskname='task4b',taskdir)
  task5b<-create_gng_task (ntrials, probability = 0.8, taskname='task5b',taskdir)
} else {
    task1b<-loadRData(file.path(taskdir,'task1b'))
    task2b<-loadRData(file.path(taskdir,'task2b'))
    task3b<-loadRData(file.path(taskdir,'task3b'))
    task4b<-loadRData(file.path(taskdir,'task4b'))
    task5b<-loadRData(file.path(taskdir,'task5b'))}
if(newtask==0) {ntrials <- nrow(task1)} #if loads in a task, sets ntrials to be the number of trials in that task
save(file=file.path(taskdir,'task1b'),task1b)
save(file=file.path(taskdir,'task2b'),task2b)
save(file=file.path(taskdir,'task3b'),task3b)
save(file=file.path(taskdir,'task4b'),task4b)
save(file=file.path(taskdir,'task5b'),task5b)
p1<-plot_task(taskname='task1b',taskdir)
p2<-plot_task(taskname='task2b',taskdir)
p3<-plot_task(taskname='task3b',taskdir)
p4<-plot_task(taskname='task4b',taskdir)
p5<-plot_gng_task(taskname='task5b',taskdir,ntrials)
```

Plot all tasks together

```{r}
(p1 + p2)/(p3 + p4)/(p5 + guide_area() + plot_layout(guides='collect')) + plot_annotation(tag_levels='A')

ggsave(file=paste0(taskdir,'task_figures_long_',ntrials,'.png'),scale=0.7,width=15,height=10)
```
Get task correlations
```{r}
tasklist<-c('task1a','task2a','task3a','task4a')
for (task in tasklist){
  load(paste0(workingdir,'/tasks/probabilities_',task))
  print(cor.test(probabilities[[1]],probabilities[[2]]))
}
```
